```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  out.width = "100%",
  dpi = 150,
  fig.retina = 2
)

library(here)
```

```{r}
plot_file <- function(base, today = Sys.Date()) {
  here("output", "plots", today, base)
}
```
